meanings: (무관심함) coolness, indifference, lukewarmness, lack of interest 냉담하다 (be) cool, half-hearted, indifferent, lukewarm, apathet...
(냉정함) cold-heartedness, heartlessness, callousness, 냉담하다 (be) cold, cold-hearted, heartless, callous, icy, frigid

examples.korean: The Emperor kept himself aloof from the people. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 황제는 백성에게 냉담했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The Emperor kept himself aloof from the people. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a callous disregard for the feelings of others 듣기 Add to Wordbook 다른 사람들의 감정을 냉담하리만치 무시함 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a callous disregard for the feelings of others Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was hurt by the coldness in his voice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그의 목소리에 담긴 냉담함에 상처를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was hurt by the coldness in his voice. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He watched her suffering with clinical detachment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 그녀의 고통을 냉담하게 거리를 두고 지켜보았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He watched her suffering with clinical detachment. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She hid her true feelings behind a shield of cold indifference. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 냉담한 무관심이라는 보호막 뒤로 자신의 진짜 감정을 감추었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She hid her true feelings behind a shield of cold indifference. Add to Wordbook
